# iru_device (Resource)

Manages a Kandji Device. Note: Devices cannot be created via Terraform, only imported and managed.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Devices cannot be created via Terraform. 
# Use 'terraform import' to manage existing devices.

# terraform import iru_device.example <device_uuid>

resource "iru_device" "example" {
  asset_tag    = "IT-MAC-001"
  blueprint_id = "c0148e35-c734-4402-b2fb-1c61aab72550"
  user_id      = "8a9f88d9-e7f4-47e6-9326-fd4b39534c4e"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `asset_tag` (String) The asset tag of the Device.
- `blueprint_id` (String) The ID of the blueprint assigned to the Device.
- `user_id` (String) The ID of the user assigned to the Device.

### Read-Only

- `device_name` (String) The name of the Device. (Read-only)
- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the Device.
- `model` (String) The model of the Device.
- `os_version` (String) The OS version of the Device.
- `platform` (String) The platform of the Device.
- `serial_number` (String) The serial number of the Device.
